posts.post_content:
I've been out of the t206 and back market for awhile. I'm looking for advice on what a fair ask is as far as value on this card. If you'd rather PM or email me please do. Help is much appreciated. Thanks. Scott

[IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm301/slatsko/image_zps5wkgllzj.jpeg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm301/slatsko/image_zps7p94pq0n.jpeg[/IMG]
how much you want for it

Looking to trade for the following. I can supplement with cash where needed. 

Lower grade 33 Goudey Ruth or Gehrig with a preference for Ruth #181
41 Play ball DiMaggio 
E92 Wagner batting
And even though I have one of each I'm always interested in a red or green Cobb portrait.

One bump. I know my trade list is pretty narrow but would still love to trade this card. I received a number of cash offers off my original post. I will most likely sell if I can't trade it. If you are inclined to make an offer please do. 

Thanks. 

Scott
